item.title: makefile语法说明
item.description: CFLAGS 表示用于C编译器的选项. 指定头文件的路径. INCLUDES := -I./ INCLUDES += -I/usr/include INCLUDES += -I/usr/local/include INCLUDES += -I../../../3rd/curl-7.65.0/include INCLUDES += -I../../../3rd/mimetic-0.9.8/include CFLAGS := -m64 -std=c++11 -g -Wall -O3 $(INCLUDES) CXXFLAGS 表示用于C++编译器的选项,基本同CFLAGS LDFLAGS
